Room.Name: Main Street
Room.ShortDescription: You are on Main Street, which continues to the north and south.
Room.LongDescription: Being that Main Street is one of the major roads in Oceancrest, it would not be unnatural not to see a few inns and taverns along the way. To the west is the Dragon Tooth Inn, a very popular and rather expensive Inn for the very exclusive upper class. The entrance to the Inn is off of Hillcrest Drive, to the south. There is also a large building on the east side of the road which seems to radiate a lot of magical energy.
